title: 'Would be disaster if ... ': Trump doubles down on tariffs after court calls them illegal; what next?
content: Donald Trump expressed his disagreement with a US federal court ruling that deemed his global tariffs "illegal." While the court's decision allows the tariffs to remain temporarily, pending a potential Supreme Court appeal, Trump vehemently criticised the ruling as "incorrect." He warned that removing the tariffs would be a "total disaster" for the US economy and vowed to fight back.

title: J&K: Cloudburst hits remote village in Ramban district; 3 dead amid heavy rains, flash floods
content: Heavy rains and a cloudburst in Jammu and Kashmir's Ramban region have resulted in tragedy, with at least three fatalities reported in the Rajgad area. Flash floods, triggered by the severe weather, have also left two individuals missing, prompting the launch of a rescue operation by the district administration.

title: Musk's lawyers to judge: Reject OpenAI’s ask for chats; unnecessary for trial
content: Elon Musk and Sam Altman's legal battle intensifies as Musk's lawyers attempt to block OpenAI from acquiring documents from Meta regarding an alleged $97.4 billion bid for OpenAI's assets. OpenAI claims Musk approached Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to join the bid, which Zuckerberg declined.

title: 'Ek Bihari sab pe bhari': Raina tips Vaibhav Suryavanshi for India debut
content: Suresh Raina predicts Vaibhav Suryavanshi, the young Rajasthan Royals' batting sensation, will soon join India's T20I team, praising his fearless approach and IPL 2025 performance, including a century against Gujarat Titans. Raina also acknowledged Ayush Mhatre's impressive performances for Chennai Super Kings and in youth Tests against England's U19 team, highlighting their potential.

title: ‘No power to impose’: US court deems most tariffs illegal
content: A US federal appeals court has ruled that most tariffs imposed by President Trump under emergency powers were illegal, challenging the core of his trade policy. The court stated that the President exceeded his authority under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) as the law does not explicitly grant the power to impose tariffs.

title: ‘American brand is in toilet’: Sullivan says Trump’s ‘trade offensive’ is pushing India toward China
content: Jake Sullivan criticizes Donald Trump's trade policies towards India, asserting they jeopardize the strategic partnership built to counter China. The recent 50% tariff on Indian exports risks pushing India closer to Beijing, as New Delhi seeks to hedge against perceived American unreliability. Sullivan argues Trump's actions undermine US credibility and hand China a diplomatic advantage.

title: 'Didn’t feel good’: Bezos on decision to skip salary; followed Zuckerberg, Buffett's lead
content: Jeff Bezos, Amazon's founder, revealed he declined compensation, believing his equity was sufficient motivation. He emphasized wealth creation for others, citing Amazon's $2.1 trillion contribution. Bezos joins tech leaders like Zuckerberg and Buffett in prioritizing value creation over personal enrichment through symbolic or minimal salaries, reflecting a Silicon Valley ethos.

title: 'Coolie' box office collection day 16: Rajinikanth starrer inches toward Rs 275cr
content: Rajinikanth's 'Coolie,' directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, has grossed Rs 273.25 crore in 15 days, facing competition from 'War 2.' Despite a strong start during the Independence Day window, day 15 saw its lowest single-day collection at Rs 1.75 crore. The film's second week added Rs 41.85 crore, with Tamil Nadu leading in regional contributions, while maintaining steady theatre occupancy.

title: IPL: Why 'Slapgate' video stayed hidden for years —Harsha Bhogle explains as Lalit Modi stirs row
content: Lalit Modi's revelation of unseen footage of the 2008 Harbhajan-Sreesanth 'slap-gate' has reignited the controversy. The incident, where Harbhajan slapped Sreesanth, was captured by Modi's security camera but never released. Harsha Bhogle explained the video was suppressed to protect the nascent IPL's image, a decision now drawing criticism despite the players' reconciliation.

title: 'Not the smartest': Oracle founder's candid take on Bill Gates; likens him to Rockefeller
content: Larry Ellison lauded Bill Gates' relentless drive, comparing him to John D. Rockefeller. Despite acknowledging others might be smarter, Ellison emphasized Gates' unmatched focus and endurance. He highlighted Gates' pivotal role in Microsoft's success, noting his 'utterly relentless' nature. The Oracle founder's remarks underscore Gates' reputation as a powerhouse, capable of dominating through execution.

title: Watch: Nitish Rana & Dignesh Rathi nearly come to blows in DPL clash
content: The Delhi Premier League Eliminator witnessed a heated clash between West Delhi Lionz and South Delhi Superstarz, highlighted by a near-brawl between Nitish Rana and Dignesh Singh Rathi. Rana's explosive unbeaten 134 propelled West Delhi to a thrilling victory, overshadowing South Delhi's earlier formidable score. The Lions now advance to Qualifier 2 after the dramatic win.

title: ‘Diplomatic embarrassment’: Hrs before tariff ruling, Trump aides sought delay- Check why
content: A US court has ruled against Donald Trump's global tariffs. The court stated that the President lacked the authority to impose such duties. This decision invalidates tariffs on China, Canada, and Mexico. Cabinet secretaries had warned of diplomatic consequences. They urged the court to delay its ruling. The administration may appeal to the Supreme Court.

title: Josh Allen’s Wife Hailee Steinfeld: Opens up on set stress; 'I feel like I know nothing'
content: BAFTA-nominated actress Hailee Steinfeld, known for roles in 'True Grit' and 'Sinners', recently shared her feelings about starting new projects, admitting to experiencing first-day nerves despite her extensive experience. Steinfeld, who values privacy, maintained a low profile with Buffalo Bills' star Josh Allen until their engagement in November 2024.

title: Taylor Swift Muse Mystery: Blake Lively’s role questioned; Keleigh Teller clip sparks fan panic
content: Taylor Swift's upcoming album, "The Life of a Showgirl," has sparked fan speculation, with some linking song titles like "Opalite" and "Elizabeth Taylor" to a resurfaced video. In the video, Swift appears to react to rings gifted by friend Keleigh Teller, leading to fan theories about the songs' inspiration.

title: Get S-Class Corvette in NMS Voyager: Step-by-step guide; use advanced Corvette parts
content: The No Man's Sky Voyager update introduces S-class Corvette ships. These ships are customizable and expandable. Players can acquire these ships by gathering resources. Salvaging scrap on planets is one way. Exploring derelict freighters is another. Trading modules at workshops also helps. Upgrading interiors and balancing builds are important. These Corvettes serve as mobile bases.

title: ‘War 2’ crashes below Rs1 cr on Day 16; Hrithik-Jr NTR starrer slows; ‘Param Sundari’takeslead
content: War 2's box office earnings sharply declined, earning only Rs 65 lakh on its third Friday, coinciding with the release of 'Param Sundari'. The Hrithik Roshan starrer, after a strong opening week of Rs 204.25 crore, faced a significant drop in its second week. 'Param Sundari's' debut at Rs 7.

title: Leon Draisaitl’s Wife Celeste: Attends Mikayla Nurse’s 30th birthday celebration in style
content: Leon Draisaitl’s wife, Celeste Desjardins, joined her close friend Mikayla Nurse, wife of Darnell Nurse, to celebrate Mikayla’s 30th birthday. The Edmonton Oilers couple, often spotted vacationing and spending off-ice time together. This marked the milestone with heartfelt social media posts, and Celeste shared fun Instagram stories. Mikayla highlighted the event with cheerful captions and stylish photos.

title: How Zuckerberg may be behind Trump's ‘tariff threat’ to countries imposing digital taxes
content: Donald Trump is considering tariffs on nations with digital taxes. This follows a meeting with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg. Zuckerberg voiced concerns about these taxes. Trump believes they unfairly target US tech companies. He also thinks they favor Chinese firms. Trump warns of tariffs and semiconductor export restrictions. Meta confirmed the meeting, stating infrastructure investments being discussed.

title: Raja Jackson Banned: Rampage Jackson’s son pulled from DPW show after Syko Stu attack
content: Raja Jackson, son of Quinton "Rampage" Jackson, faces a ban from a Danger Pro Wrestling event after a controversial attack on wrestler Syko Stu at a KnokX Pro show. The venue denies Raja was ever officially booked, suggesting his name was used for promotion. This incident raises questions about independent wrestling promotions offering opportunities to Raja.

title: Patrick Mahomes on Dylan Raiola: Breaks silence on lookalike’s antics; calls reaction 'cool'
content: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes has addressed the ongoing comparisons between himself and Nebraska quarterback Dylan Raiola, acknowledging the young player's emulation of his style as 'cool.'  Mahomes, who sees similarities in Raiola's throwing technique and mannerisms, revealed they trained together last year. Despite Mahomes leaving the Nebraska opener midway, he extends full support to Raiola and the team.

title: 'Social Truth' vs data: What Trump doesn't get about India's 'dead' economy
content: India's GDP surged by 7.8% in the April-June quarter, exceeding expectations and marking the fastest growth in five quarters, driven by robust farm output, private spending, and a thriving services sector. Despite this strong performance, looming US tariffs threaten India's export engine and could potentially dampen future growth, impacting employment and private investment.

title: DPL 2025: Ugly brawl breaks out; Lady umpire intervenes - Watch
content: A fiery clash marred the Delhi Premier League eliminator between West Delhi Lionz and South Delhi Superstarz following Krish Yadav's dismissal. The incident escalated into a physical altercation involving players from both teams, requiring umpire intervention. This overshadowed South Delhi Superstarz's score of 201/5 and an earlier altercation involving Digvesh Rathi and Nitish Rana.

title: ‘Param Sundari’ box office: Sidharth and Janhvi rom-com earns over Rs 7 cr on opening day
content: ‘Param Sundari,’ starring Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor, hit theaters this Friday, generating significant buzz for its intercultural love story and the actors' fresh chemistry. The Tushar Jalota-directed romantic comedy earned an estimated Rs. 7.25 crore on its opening day.

title: Putin to visit India in Dec; big signal to Trump amid raging trade war
content: Vladimir Putin will visit India in December, confirmed by the Kremlin, amidst growing ties between the two nations following US trade tariffs on New Delhi. Putin is also scheduled to meet Narendra Modi at the SCO Summit in China. Discussions will include preparations for the December visit, highlighting the continued strategic partnership despite Western pressure on Russia.

title: 'Fight larger battle': Why Sibal's advice may not stop Kejriwal from targeting Cong
content: Kapil Sibal has advised Arvind Kejriwal to cease his attacks on the Congress party and instead focus on the larger battle against the BJP. This comes after Kejriwal alleged a BJP-Congress nexus, questioning why no major Congress leader has been arrested in the National Herald case. Sibal reminded Kejriwal of his past apologies for baseless allegations.

title: Travis Hunter & Leanna Lenee: Surprise baby news sparks fan outrage; 'most expensive divorce' talk
content: Jacksonville Jaguars' rookie Travis Hunter and his wife, Leanna Lenee, recently welcomed their first child, sparking a wave of criticism from fans online. The couple, who married in June, faced speculation about their relationship and pregnancy, which they never publicly addressed. Despite the negativity, Hunter and Lenee remain committed to each other, having previously defended their bond against online hate.

title: JD Vance meltdown over Politico story: Claims 'foreign influence operation’
content: JD Vance has strongly criticized a Politico report questioning Steve Witkoff's role in Russia-Ukraine talks, labeling it a "foreign influence operation." Vance defended Witkoff's progress in negotiations, highlighting narrowed issues like security guarantees and territorial concessions. The controversy has sparked online abuse targeting the Politico reporter, raising concerns about backchannel diplomacy efforts.

title: Savannah James Speaks Out: Reveals intense bond with LeBron; 'He wants to live in my skin'
content: LeBron James and his wife, Savannah, celebrated over two decades of togetherness, their bond highlighted in the Netflix docuseries 'Starting 5.' Savannah shared insights into their deep connection, emphasizing LeBron's profound love and describing him as her 'bestie.' LeBron consistently acknowledges Savannah's pivotal role in his NBA success, attributing his achievements to her unwavering support.

title: 'Hate remarks': BJP slams Moitra's shocking comment on Shah; complaint filed
content: TMC MP Mahua Moitra ignited controversy with a remark targeting Amit Shah, allegedly stating his "head should be cut off" regarding illegal immigration. The BJP strongly condemned Moitra's statement as hateful, questioning if it reflected the TMC's stance. Moitra accused the Union government of border security negligence, referencing PM Modi's Independence Day speech on infiltrators.

title: Trump wrecking America-India ties, admits US Congress report
content: Donald Trump has never disguised his transactional approach to foreign policy. But in 2025, his behaviour toward India has crossed into something far more disruptive. He has claimed credit for ending a May India-Pakistan conflict (a claim Delhi flatly rejects). He has invited Pakistan’s army chief to lunch at the White House, prompting anger in Delhi that Washington is “treating India and Pakistan as equals.” And he has escalated a tariff war, leaving Indian exporters facing what the US Congressional Research Service (CRS) describes as a “50% tariff on India on top of existing tariffs.”

title: Sikh man shot dead in LA: What prompted cops to take deadly action?
content: A LAPD police video revealed the fatal shooting of Gurpreet Singh, a 35-year-old Sikh man, after 911 calls reported him wielding a machete and threatening people. Singh, seen performing Gatka, charged at officers after a car chase, leading to the shooting. The incident is under investigation, with reviews to determine if the use of force was justified.

title: Chennai Cardiac Surgeon, 39, Suffers Heart Attack During Rounds At Hospital, Dies
content: Dr Gradlin Roy, a consultant cardiac surgeon at Saveetha Medical College, collapsed in the hospital on Wednesday.

title: 3 Dead, Many Houses Damaged After Cloudburst In J&K's Ramban, Rescue Ops On
content: At least three people were killed following a cloudburst in Jammu and Kashmir's Ramban today. Several houses were also damaged, with at least five people reported missing.

title: "Would Be Total Disaster If...": Trump As US Court Calls His Tariffs Illegal
content: US President Donald Trump on Saturday reaffirmed that all tariffs imposed on countries would remain in effect, and if removed, would be "disastrous to the country."

title: Explained: What Happens To Trump's Tariffs After US Court Knocked Them Down
content: US President Donald Trump has audaciously claimed virtually unlimited power to bypass Congress and impose sweeping taxes on foreign products. Now a federal appeals court has thrown a roadblock in his path.

title: NDTV Defence Summit 2025 Live Updates: Rajnath Singh To Speak On "Warfare In 21st Century", Op Sindoor
content: NDTV is back with its annual premier event, the Defence Summit. This year's conclave will focus on "Warfare in the 21st Century" and Defence Minister Rajnath Singh is set to deliver the opening address.

title: Karnataka Man Kills Daughter Over Inter-Caste Relationship: Cops
content: A man allegedly strangled his daughter, forced pesticide into her mouth to stage it as a suicide, and later performed her last rites because she was in a relationship with a young man from a different community, Kalaburagi Police Commissioner said.

title: PM Modi Japan Visit LIVE: PM Modi Meets Japanese Counterpart, Attend Press Meet
content: PM Modi Japan Visit Day-1 LIVE Updates: Prime Minister Narendra Modi landed in Tokyo on Friday for his two-day official visit to Japan.

title: PM Modi, Xi Jinping Likely To Meet Twice On SCO Summit Sidelines
content: PM Modi and Chinese President Xi Jinping are expected to hold two bilateral meetings on the sidelines of the SCO summit in Tianjin on Sunday, as both nations look to strengthen ties amid global trade tensions sparked by US President Donald Trump.

title: Meta Created Flirty Chatbots Of Taylor Swift, Other Celebrities Without Permission: Report
content: Meta has appropriated the names and likenesses of celebrities  including Taylor Swift, Scarlett Johansson, Anne Hathaway and Selena Gomez  to create dozens of flirty social-media chatbots without their permission, Reuters has found.

title: Trump Moves To Cut  $5 Billion In Congressionally Approved Foreign Aid
content: US President Donald Trump has moved to cut nearly $5 billion of congressionally-approved foreign aid, the White House said Friday -- raising the likelihood of a federal shutdown as Democrats oppose the policy.

title: "Discriminatory": Putin Slams Western Trade Sanctions Ahead Of China Visit
content: On the eve of a visit to China, Russian leader Vladimir Putin blasted Western sanctions as his country's economy teetered on the brink of recession, wounded by trade curbs and the cost of his war in Ukraine.

title: US Says It Will Deny Visas To Palestinian Officials For UN Meeting
content: The United States said Friday it will deny visas to members of the Palestinian Authority to attend next month's UN General Assembly, where France is leading a push to recognize a Palestinian state.

title: "Will Win In End': Trump Slams Court Ruling On Global Tariffs
content: US President Donald Trump vowed Friday to go to the Supreme Court over an appeals court ruling that most of the tariffs he has imposed on US imports, upending global trade, were illegal.

title: Israel, US Seek To "Divide, Destroy Iran", Says Iranian President
content: Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian said on Friday that Iran does not seek war but if Israel and the United States attacked, Iran will stand against them "forcefully".

title: US Court Rules Many Of Trump's Global Tariffs Are Illegal
content: A US appeals court on Friday ruled that many of President Donald Trump's tariffs, which have upended global trade, were illegal -- but allowed them to remain in place for now, giving him time to take the fight to the Supreme Court.

title: 5 Killed, 11 Missing As Fresh Cloudbursts, Landslides Hit Uttarakhand
content: Six people were killed and 11 went missing as heavy rains and a series of cloudbursts wreaked havoc in various districts of Uttarakhand early Friday, triggering landslides that damaged houses and left people buried under mounds of rubble.

title: India, Japan Adopt Joint Declaration On Security, Defence Cooperation
content: India and Japan on Friday laid a strong foundation for "a new and golden chapter" in the Special Strategic and Global Partnership, setting a roadmap for the next decade and advancing cooperation across eight pillars to give new vigour to the ties.

title: Trump Still Working For Putin-Zelensky Meeting: White House
content: US President Donald Trump is still working on a Russia-Ukraine peace summit, the White House said Friday, after French President Emmanuel Macron warned Trump risked being "played" by Vladimir Putin.

title: Delhi High Court Asks Hospital To Treat Ill Child In Economically Weak Section
content: The Delhi High Court on Friday directed a private hospital to provide medical treatment under the EWS category to a 12-year-old boy in dire need of a ventilator bed after he fell from a building.

title: PM Modi, Putin To Meet On Monday On Sidelines Of SCO Summit: Kremlin Aide
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin will meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday on the sidelines of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) Summit in China's Tianjin, Kremlin foreign policy aide Yuri Ushakov said on Friday.

title: Nick Wright on Swift & Kelce: Slams “publicity stunt” talk; reacts to engagement news
content: Following Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's engagement announcement, sports analyst Nick Wright defended their relationship against critics on The Dan Patrick Show, urging those who doubted its authenticity to acknowledge their error. Jason Kelce also offered congratulations on the New Heights podcast, celebrating the couple's exciting news. Fans eagerly anticipate wedding details.

title: 'Disgusting!': Sreesanth's wife slams Lalit Modi for digging up Slapgate video
content: Lalit Modi's comments reignite the 2008 Harbhajan Singh-Sreesanth controversy. Modi claims to possess unseen footage of the incident. Sreesanth's wife strongly criticizes Modi and Michael Clarke. She accuses them of exploiting the past for publicity. She highlights the impact on her family and children. The incident occurred during an IPL match between Kings XI Punjab and Mumbai Indians.

title: India's GDP grows at robust 7.8% in Q1 FY26; beats estimates by wide margin
content: India's GDP surged by 7.8% in the first quarter of FY 2025-26, exceeding expectations and surpassing the previous year's 6.5% growth. This robust performance is a welcome boost amidst concerns about potential impacts from newly imposed US tariffs. The agriculture and tertiary sectors showed significant improvements, while mining and quarrying experienced a decline.

title: Micah Parsons Trade Talk: Jerry Jones shifts tone; Cowboys hint at blockbuster move
content: Dallas Cowboys traded Micah Parsons to Green Bay Packers. This move frees up 19 million dollars. Cowboys now have 42 million dollars in cap space for 2025. This allows them to sign other players. They can extend contracts of DaRon Bland and Tyler Smith. Jerry Jones mentioned Parsons could bring resources in a trade.

title: Drama 'resolved,' Parsons thrilled for fresh start
content: Micah Parsons was introduced by the Packers on Friday and said he was relieved and excited to get back to playing football after a contentious offseason in Dallas.

title: Miami LB Hayes charged with vehicular homicide
content: Miami linebacker Adarius Hayes has been charged with three counts of vehicular homicide and one count of reckless driving with serious bodily injury following an investigation into a May crash that killed three people.

title: Buffs put bathroom on sideline for Coach Prime
content: Colorado has installed a sideline bathroom next to the team's bench for coach Deion Sanders, who had his bladder removed over the offseason after being diagnosed with cancer.

title: Suspended Little Leaguer's bat sells for $10K
content: The bat tossed in the air by a New Jersey Little Leaguer to celebrate a home run that earned him a suspension later lifted by a judge sold Friday for nearly $10,000 at auction.

title: Djokovic withstands back pain, Norrie to advance
content: Novak Djokovic shook off a back problem early in the match to beat Cam Norrie on Friday night and at 38, he became the oldest man to reach the fourth round of the US Open since Jimmy Connors was the same age in 1991.

title: Tong gets ovation, wins debut in Mets' rout
content: Mets' right-hander Jonah Tong allowed one earned run in five innings in his major league debut in a 19-9 victory over the Marlins on Friday night.

title: Red Sox release Buehler, call up prospect Tolle
content: The Red Sox released veteran right-hander Walker Buehler in a series of moves Friday that included calling up top pitching prospect Payton Tolle for his major league debut.

title: FBI reveals more Pete Rose gambling documents
content: The Federal Bureau of Investigation has released new documents relating to baseball great Pete Rose, his former bookie and the gambling scandal that led to Rose's previous ban from the sport and from entry into the Hall of Fame.

title: 🏈 Fantasy football: Do Not Draft list
content: The annual hit is back, with players Eric Karabell feels are going earlier than they should in drafts this summer.

title: Four questions in the Micah Parsons trade aftermath: Why in the world would Dallas do this?
content: What are the Cowboys doing? Did they get enough in return? And does Parsons put the Packers at the top of the NFC? Let's sort through this wild trade.

title: A new look in Green Bay: Parsons trade continues Packers' aggressive offseason
content: Signs of change in Green Bay include paying up to trade for Parsons after finally taking a WR in the first round.

title: From Collier to Clark and more: How injury returns could impact the playoffs
content: Napheesa Collier and Breanna Stewart are back, with more injured stars eyeing returns before the postseason.

title: Debunking your favorite NFL officiating conspiracy theories
content: Are the refs penalizing some teams more than others? Which coaches win challenges? We crunched the numbers.

title: Breaking down Texas-Ohio State, LSU-Clemson and 24 other matchups in an epic Week 1
content: College football is back in a big way, with Arch Manning and Texas taking on the defending champs, a showdown in Death Valley and more.

title: NBA predictions: 10 teams that could exceed, fall short of ESPN's forecast
content: Too low on OKC? Too high on the Spurs? Tim Bontemps breaks down ESPN's Summer Forecast win predictions.

title: To transfer or not to transfer? For USMNT players in a World Cup year, there's no perfect answer
content: The goal is clear: find your best form and make the 2026 World Cup roster. But USMNT hopefuls must decide whether a transfer is necessary to achieve it.

title: Why Man United's best player may be their biggest problem
content: As Manchester United's freefall continues, is captain and talisman Bruno Fernandes becoming more of a liability than an asset?

title: As Coco Gauff struggles to change her serve, it's been a rocky US Open already
content: Gauff knew she needed to make a change to her serve -- and she took a gamble, hiring a new coach just days before the US Open.

title: Let's predict the NFL draft: Kiper's 10 preseason takes, including why all eyes are on Penn State
content: Which school will have the most picks? How many QBs will go in Round 1? Who is a sleeper for WR1? Mel Kiper Jr. makes predictions for the 2026 NFL draft class.

title: Liz Loza's draft rules (there are none!), five players to pick and two to fade
content: It's finally time to make picks, so consider the trends surrounding these players as you prepare your draft board.

title: Mike Clay's Playbook, Part 3: How to manage your team post-draft
content: The draft is just the beginning of the fun. Mike Clay gives you a guide to being a savvy, championship-winning manager.

title: The five stories that explain why Arch Manning was built for this moment
content: How did the Texas quarterback learn to handle the pressure he's facing as the most famous college football player in the country?

title: Lee Corso's impact felt far beyond 'GameDay' audience
content: The larger-than-life face of college football has touched so many, from fans and players to colleagues and friends.

title: Baylor's anthracite and chrome combo headline best college football uniforms from Week 1
content: While Baylor revives its gold chrome helmets, Utah State will be donning cow print helmets that have a hilarious origin story.

title: Ben Shelton and Trinity Rodman relationship timeline
content: The NWSL player playfully challenged the tennis star with a question about his 2nd-round US Open performance.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea eye loan move for Buonanotte
content: Chelsea are reportedly looking to sign Brighton & Hove Albion's Facundo Buonanotte on loan. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: 'The Rich Eisen Show' on ESPN: How to listen and watch
content: 'The Rich Eisen Show' is joining forces with ESPN platforms! Find out how to get your weekday dose of pop culture and sports now.

title: Poozhikkunnu in Thiruvananthapuram has been celebrating Onam with floral carpets for 38 years
content: Under the initiative of the Poozhikkunnu Pourasamithi, giant pookkalams are laid by the residents of the village with flowers bought from Thovala flower market

title: PM Modi meets Japan’s Governors of 16 prefectures, highlights areas of collaboration | LIVE
content: PM Modi is on a two-day official visit to Japan to attend the India–Japan Summit and hold wide-ranging talks with the Japanese leadership

title: Ready-to-eat Onasadya packs from Kerala find clientele among the Malayali expats
content: Frozen, ready-to-eat Onasadya packs are sold around the world, including the UK, the US, Canada, Australia and New Zealand by various companies in Kerala

title: Deadline to issue 3D notification on land acquisition for Kochi Bypass ends
content: Delay in publishing the notification may lead to an increase in the cost of land acquisition and that of raw materials for the NH project that is estimated to cost ₹6,000 crore

title: PM Modi calls for deeper India-Japan state-prefecture cooperation in meet with 16 governors
content: Discussions focused on ways to further deepen the growing partnerships between Indian states and Japanese prefectures in the fields of technology, innovation, investment, skills, start-ups and SMEs

title: A sunflower field in Thiruvananthapuram is grabbing eyeballs
content: Sunflowers are in full bloom on six acres inside St Xavier’s College, Thumba, at the farm run by agripreneur SV Sujith

title: Mayawati appoints nephew Akash Anand as BSP national convenor
content: According to party sources, Akash's responsibility will be to review the work of all sectors, central and state coordinators and state presidents; he will report directly to Mayawati

title: West Bengal to add 14,000 polling booths next year’s Assembly polls
content: The number of polling booths in the state is about 80,661; if 13,816 booths are added to this, the total number of booths will be 94,497.

title: CBI Court convicts 10 including former Jharkhand Minister Anosh Ekka in land acquisition case
content: The central agency in its official press statement stated that CBI had registered the instant case on 11.08.2010 against Hari Narain Rai and Anosh Ekka and others in compliance of the order passed by the Jharkhand High Court.

title: U.S. revokes visas of Palestinian president, other officials ahead of UN General Assembly
content: The move is the latest in a series of steps the Trump administration has taken to target Palestinians with visa restrictions and comes as the Israeli military declared Gaza's largest city a combat zone

title: Noida dowry death: Nikki Bhati’s trial by fire
content: On August 21, Nikki Bhati, 26, died of severe burn injuries in Sirsa, Uttar Pradesh. Married for nine years, Nikki had allegedly complained to her parents often about domestic abuse and dowry demands, but they had urged her to stay on. When Nikki and her sister opened a beauty parlour, the harassment allegedly worsened. Alisha Dutta reports on the horrific crime and the contrasting pieces of evidence that the police have

title: Army, ITBP conduct firepower drills in Arunachal Pradesh
content: The firepower drills were undertaken to ensure seamless coordination in high-altitude operational environments

title: Women biotech scientists await funds for research
content: 75 candidates selected for Science Ministry’s DBT Biocare programme in March unable to commence research

title: BJP supporters vandalise West Bengal Congress headquarters in Kolkata
content: West Bengal Congress president Subhankar Sarkar has demanded arrest of BJP leader Rakesh Singh who led the attack

title: West Bengal CM hails Supreme Court’s intervention on detention of migrant workers
content: PIL on detention of migrant workers was filed before the Supreme Court by the West Bengal Migrant Welfare Board

title: ED conducts searches in FEMA case against Haryana-based real estate firm
content: ED says BPTP Ltd. got FDI of over ₹500 crore from Mauritius-based entities in violation of rules; Agency searches company’s offices as well as residences of its chairman and director

title: A.P. officials on alert as first flood warning level issued for Godavari at Bhadrachalam in Telangana
content: Water level is likely to reach the second warning level of 48 feet at Bhadrachalam on Saturday, says official;  heavy rain is expected in north coastal A.P.

title: Across dynasties and decades, Milad-un-Nabi threads faith, festivity and service
content: Hyderabad’s Milad takes on added significance this time as the city joins the global community in marking the 1,500th birth anniversary of Prophet Muhammed with a grand juloos, prayer meetings and service activities

title: The ocean’s new eyes: Fishermen to join INCOIS in tracking marine trends
content: As part of a citizen-science push, INCOIS will equip fishermen with sensors and satellite tools to feed real-time data from the sea, strengthening advisories on fishing grounds, safety alerts and long-term ocean research

title: India signs pact with Japan for low carbon technologies
content: The Memorandum of Cooperation will facilitate implementation of projects contributing to greenhouse gas reduction or removal and sustainable development in India

title: M.P. BJP worker files complaint after social media users claim he ‘abused’ PM Modi in Bihar
content: The remarks on PM Modi triggered a political storm in poll-bound Bihar as well as in other parts of the country

title: Bihar Cabinet approves Mukhya Mantri Mahila Rozgar Yojana
content: As per the scheme, one woman from each family will get ₹10,000 as grant to start a business; this will give women the opportunity to start businesses of their own choice and will create employment opportunities in the State itself

title: Kozhikode Corpn. struggles to identify land for dog park
content: None of the land under the civic body found suitable; expressions of interest invited from private parties; Opposition councillors stage walkout, insisting the park be built on Corporation’s plot

title: Facing outcry, L-G announces probe into Vaishno Devi Shrine landslip that left 34 dead on August 26
content: Several civil society bodies, including Jammu High Court Bar Association, demanded a probe into the incident.

title: NHAI allocates ₹100 crore to repair Kullu-Manali road damaged in flash floods
content: Manali remains cut off after rain, floods and landslides battered NH 21; NHAI is exploring long-term solutions like construction of tunnels and elevated structures

title: Enforcement Directorate seeks fugitive tag for Amira Pure Foods CMD and director
content: The agency tells Delhi court that the two are abroad; proceedings initiated to confiscate assets worth ₹131 crore

title: Modi wins elections by stealing votes, says Rahul Gandhi
content: Praising the people’s participation in Voter Adhikar Yatra, Gandhi says the people of Bihar have given a lot of energy to the yatra and slogans against vote theft are echoing across the country

title: Arms and explosives recovered from Maoist dump in Chhattisgarh
content: Over 300 items seized in joint operation in Abujhmad forests; police suspect Maoist hand in Bijapur killing

title: Congress targets Amit Shah, accuses him of spreading ‘lies’ against Rahul Gandhi
content: The Congress attack comes after Mr. Shah, while addressing an event in Guwahati, said the Congress leader should apologise for the ‘abuses’ hurled at Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his late mother during the Yatra in Bihar.

title: Supreme Court seeks clarity from government if Bengali speakers are presumed as ‘foreigners’
content: The petition filed by an NGO alleged that labourers from West Bengal were detained without due verification, procedural safeguards or compliance with established inter-State coordination protocols

title: Important for India, China to work together to bring stability to world economic order: PM
content: India is ready to advance bilateral relations from a strategic and long-term perspective on the basis of mutual respect, mutual interest and mutual sensitivity, and to enhance strategic communication to address our developmental challenges, says PM Narendra Modi

title: Govt. extends ECHS benefits to medically boarded-out cadets
content: According to Ministry of Defence, the new measure, applicable to cadets medically boarded out before completing training as well as future cases, seeks to ease the humanitarian and financial burden

title: The Hindu Impact: V. Somanna promises review to fast-track Bengaluru Suburban Railway Project
content: His assurance follows The Hindu’s ‘Spotlight’ report published on August 29, titled ‘A dream derailed’, which highlighted the project’s setbacks

title: Sasikanth Senthil begins indefinite fast against the Centre for withholding SSA funds from Tamil Nadu
content: The Union government has a moral obligation to release the money first and then discuss the disagreements with the State government. It should not disrupt the education of children, the Tiruvallur  Congress MP says

title: Bihar SIR: Eight border districts account for most notices by Election Commission of India
content: Districts sharing borders with Nepal and West Bengal have highest number of voters who did not submit needed documents or whose eligibility and citizenship are under doubt; hearings to begin next week

title: Uber resumes bike taxi services in Karnataka as ‘Bike Direct’
content: Rapido has recently introduced a feature called Bike Direct to continue its services, describing it as a ‘non-profit initiative’

title: Railways notifies 150 special trains for festive season rush
content: The special trains will be running from September 21 to November 30, covering the festivals of Durga Puja, Diwali and Chhath Puja

title: Animal Husbandry dept. to launch e-Samrudha digital livestock and e-health management system on August 30
content: E-Samrudha envisions integrating services related to livestock management and veterinary services in the State on a single platform

title: Indian Navy reaffirms commitment to dialogue, trust and cooperative security in Indian Ocean Region
content: The emerging leaders discuss maritime cooperation at IONS panel, emphasising technology, training, and regional security in the Indian Ocean

title: Speaker Om Birla flags decline in standards of debate
content: At SC/ST welfare meet in Bhubaneswar, calls for equity-based nation ensuring rights of Dalits, tribals, marginalised sections

title: Land assignment rules an Onam gift for residents of Kerala’s hill districts, says Minister
content: The 1960 land assignment Act was amended and new rules made to solve the over six-decade-long land-related problems, particularly in Idukki. The rules, likely to be implemented by mid-Sept., give the govt. the power to grant permission for using land for purposes other than stated

title: RSS chief Bhagwat’s remarks on Mathura-Kashi are to shield BJP government from public anger: CPI(M)
content: CPI(M) Polit Bureau cites Bhagwat’s remarks that Muslims should ‘give away’ the mosques in these two places for ‘brotherhood’

title: Minister seeks to allay fears over constructions  in Idukki
content: New rules legalise construction violations until June 7, 2024.  However, it is silent on permission for new constructions and farmers’ groups and the Idukki diocese of the Syro Malabar Church have raised concerns

title: Sharmila accuses TDP-JSP-BJP combine of crippling Vizag Steel Plant
content: APCC chief alleges workforce cuts and Centre’s ‘backdoor plan’ are driving RINL into losses; slams State parties for remaining silent and backs reinvestigation into Vivekananda’s murder case

title: Minister inaugurates stadium renovated at ₹46 lakh at Puthenchira in Thrissur
content: Minister says government is moving towards its declared goal of setting up sports facilities in every grama panchayat

title: Months after Op Sindoor, Pakistan says ready for composite dialogue with India

title: MLB Power Rankings: Where every team stands as final month approaches
content: alden Gonzalez and Jesse Rogers weigh in on who they like most to come out on top of the American League wild-card race . teams are mostly split into three categories: those preparing for the playoffs, those trying to make a run at contention and those whose focus has turned to next season . there's still a fair amount to play for within those groups .

title: Where will your team's next ballpark be? What Royals can teach us about the future of MLB stadiums
content: The K is located in the Truman Sports Complex, next to Arrowhead Stadium . your feelings about that location might depend on how you view the relationship between baseball and the cities in which it is played . in 2021, so long ago that Bobby Witt Jr. had not yet debuted in the majors, Royals owner John Sherman announced a search for a new venue .

title: Week 1 preview: Player expectations, freshmen to watch and more

title: Gauff meets Simone Biles after US Open win, credits her for inspiring victory
content: Coco Gauff beats Donna Vekic 7-6 (7-5), 6-2 in straight sets at the us open . the pair met after the match, and Gauff thanked her mom so she could say hi . seven-time olympic gold medalist Simone Biles came in the stands .

title: Who has a shot at the championship? Projecting conference and Finals winners
content: this season, the Oklahoma City Thunder will look to become the first back-to-back champions since 2018 . but there will be plenty of challengers . the new york Knicks have plenty of postseason experience to push even fury .

title: Young Eze's desire to improve led him back to Arsenal
content: eberechi Eze was released from the academy at 13 . the 27-year-old joined arsenal from crystal palace in £67.5m deal . he's achieved what most professional footballers dream of, even if he is rejected by a club .

title: College football hot seats: Brace yourselves for potential blue-blood turnover
content: the college football job market took an expected turn last year . last offseason, there was a dip in head coaching changes at FBS football . the year before, a record 32 jobs turned over, per NCAA statistics .

title: The game is on the line: Which WNBA player gets the last shot?
content: nneka Ogwumike's clutch bucket at the buzzer gives the Storm an 84-82 win over the Mystics . sports experts contend there's no such thing as a consistent clutch player in any sport . who are the biggest clutch shooters in the WNBA, when a game is on the line .
